fbus_hdr Struct Reference

Structure of the EIB header for each telegram. More...

#include <fb_prot.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t ctrl
 control byte l0r1pp00, l=frame length (0=long frame, more then 15 octets, 1=short frame), r=repeat flag, pp=priority (for communication medium TP1)
uint8_t src [2]
 source adress, 16-bit, hhhhmmmm llllllll, convert it to ascii so you have: h.m.l or e.g.
uint8_t dest [2]
 destination adress, 16-bit, hhhhmmmm llllllll if DAF=0, 0hhhhmmm llllllll if DAF=1, DAF can be found in npci
uint8_t npci
 dnnnllll, d=destination address flag (DAF, 0==unicast, 1==multicast), n=network control field, l=length
uint8_t tpci
 combination of tpci (t) and apci (a), tttt ttaa
uint8_t apci
 application layer protocol control information, here every function has its own number

Detailed Description

Structure of the EIB header for each telegram.

Field Documentation

uint8_t fbus_hdr::apci

application layer protocol control information, here every function has its own number

Referenced by A_ADC_Read(), A_DeviceDescriptor_Read(), A_Memory_Read(), A_Memory_Write(), A_PhysicalAddress_Read(), fb_handlemsg(), readApplication(), runApplication(), sendExtTelegram(), sendTelegram(), and sendTestTelegram().

uint8_t fbus_hdr::ctrl

control byte l0r1pp00, l=frame length (0=long frame, more then 15 octets, 1=short frame), r=repeat flag, pp=priority (for communication medium TP1)

Referenced by A_PhysicalAddress_Read(), fb_new_msg(), readApplication(), sendExtTelegram(), sendTelegram(), and sendTestTelegram().

destination adress, 16-bit, hhhhmmmm llllllll if DAF=0, 0hhhhmmm llllllll if DAF=1, DAF can be found in npci

Referenced by check_addr(), fb_new_msg(), readApplication(), runApplication(), sendExtTelegram(), sendTelegram(), and sendTestTelegram().

dnnnllll, d=destination address flag (DAF, 0==unicast, 1==multicast), n=network control field, l=length

Referenced by A_ADC_Read(), A_DeviceDescriptor_Read(), A_Memory_Read(), check_addr(), fb_handlemsg(), fb_new_msg(), ncd_resp(), readApplication(), sendExtTelegram(), sendTelegram(), and sendTestTelegram().

source adress, 16-bit, hhhhmmmm llllllll, convert it to ascii so you have: h.m.l or e.g.
